mapper.insert: insert into payment (paycode, userid, totalwage, totalsalary, relate, payday) values (#{payCode},#{userId} ,nvl(#{totalWage, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null) ,nvl(#{totalSalary, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null) ,nvl(#{relate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null) ,to_date( nvl(#{payDay, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null),'yyyyMMdd') )
mapper.select: select paycode, userid, totalwage, totalsalary, relate, payday from payment
select paycode, userid, totalwage, totalsalary, relate, payday from payment where paycode = #{paycode}
select paycode, userid, totalwage, totalsalary, relate, payday from payment where userid = #{userId}

select e.userid,nvl(po.positionname,'미정') positionname, e.usernm, nvl(d.deptname,'미정') deptname, nvl(p.totalwage,0) totalwage, nvl(p.totalsalary,0) totalsalary, to_char(e.joincompany,'yyyy-MM-dd') joincompany from employee e left outer join (select userid,sum(totalwage) totalwage,sum(totalsalary) totalsalary from payment group by userid) p on e.userid=p.userid left outer join position po on e.positioncode=po.positioncode left outer join dept d on d.deptcode=e.deptcode

select e.userid,nvl(po.positionname,'미정') positionname, e.usernm, nvl(d.deptname,'미정') deptname, nvl(p.totalwage,0) totalwage, nvl(p.totalsalary,0) totalsalary, to_char(e.joincompany,'yyyy-MM-dd') joincompany from employee e left outer join (select userid,sum(totalwage) totalwage,sum(totalsalary) totalsalary from payment group by userid) p on e.userid=p.userid left outer join position po on e.positioncode=po.positioncode left outer join dept d on d.deptcode=e.deptcode where e.usernm like '%'||#{usernm}||'%'
